plot: When Patrick learns that Tina is expecting a child from Heiko, he wants nothing more to do with her. His father personally breaks off the engagement on the phone. Tina is desperate. She wants her brother to help her abort the child. A reporter bursts into the siblings' conversation. He wants to interview Tina. The reason: A young man had told the press that he was the father of her baby and wanted to raise the child.
